reqs: Continuation of MUSC 410/500D, concentrating on larger tonal forms, fine points of analytical notation, research tools in Schenker studies, and examination of published and unpublished analyses by Schenker and his pupils. With 533B.
courseName: Selected Topics in Music - ADV SCHENKER ANL
description: See School of Music schedule for description and prerequisites. Restricted to B. Mus. and B.A. in Music students.
